name: flideck
description: Local-first presentation harness for folder-based HTML artifacts

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w client"
scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w server && npm run build -w client
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w shared && npm run typecheck -w client && npm run typecheck -w server
